mapper.select: SELECT IDX , ASC_NM , ASC_ADDR , CONCAT( ASC_PHN_1, '-', ASC_PHN_2, '-', ASC_PHN_3 ) as ASC_PHN , ASC_WEKD_TMZ , ASC_WEKE_TMZ , ASC_MKHD , ASC_MAP_LINK , ASC_MAP_IMG_OG_NM , ASC_MAP_IMG_PATH , ASC_MAP_IMG_REAL_NM FROM TB_ASC WHERE USE_FLG = 'Y' AND DEL_FLG = 'N' ORDER BY ASC_SORT ASC, REG_DT DESC
